title: Friday Post Show (02-11-22)
itunes:title: Friday Post Show (02-11-22)
description:
We started the Post Show earlier today so we’re able to take calls. Tyler tells us about a practical joke that Brooks and Dunn played back in the 90s. We talk to Christine in Austin to talk about the Tinder Swindler. Lauren in Louisiana calls in because she was watching live on Facebook and tells us what segment she loves the most. Another listener suggest that Lunchbox donate his money from his business to charity. In the news, the first female urinal is coming that is portable and how men are the best tippers. We reveal how much we tip at dinner. Lunchbox and Raymundo talk about an awkward encounter they had with a country artist at a charity cornhole event.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
We started the Post Show earlier today so we’re able to take calls. Tyler tells us about a practical joke that Brooks and Dunn played back in the 90s. We talk to Christine in Austin to talk about the Tinder Swindler. Lauren in Louisiana calls in because she was watching live on Facebook and tells us what segment she loves the most. Another listener suggest that Lunchbox donate his money from his business to charity. In the news, the first female urinal is coming that is portable and how men are the best tippers. We reveal how much we tip at dinner. Lunchbox and Raymundo talk about an awkward encounter they had with a country artist at a charity cornhole event.
